Defect.Name: Pipe Broken
Defect.Define: 管道的外部压力超过自身的承受力致使管子发生破裂。其形式有纵向、环向和复合3种

DefectDescribe.Content: Rift - A significant gap has formed in the rupture, but the shape of the pipe is unaffected and the rupture does not fall off.
Broken--The circumferential coverage of the broken or collapsed debris of the pipe wall is not more than 60°.

Defect.Name: Deformation
Defect.Define: 管道受外力挤压造成形状变异

DefectDescribe.Content: The deformation is not more than 5% of the pipe diameter.
The deformation is 5%~15% of the pipe diameter.
Deformed to 15% to 25% of pipe diameter
The deformation is greater than 25% of the pipe diameter.

Defect.Name: Corrosion
Defect.Define: The inner wall of the pipe is eroded and lost or peeled off, and the surface of the pipe is rough or steel exposed.

DefectDescribe.Content: Mild corrosion - the surface is slightly peeled off and the surface of the tube is uneven.
Moderate corrosion - surface flaking reveals coarse aggregate or steel.
Severe corrosion - coarse aggregate or steel bars are completely exposed.

Defect.Name: Joint Displaced
Defect.Define: 同一接口的两个管口产生横向偏差， 未处于管道的正确位置

DefectDescribe.Content: Mild joint displaced - the pipe joint displaced are not more than 1/2 of the pipe wall thickness.
Moderately joint displaced - the pipe jonit displaced are between 1/2 and 1 of the pipe wall thickness.
Severely joint displaced--the pipe joint displaced are 1~2 times the thickness of the pipe wall.
More severely joint displaced - the pipe jonit displaced are more than twice the thickness of the pipe wall.

Defect.Name: ups and downs
Defect.Define: 接口位置低处形成洼水

DefectDescribe.Content: Fluctuation height / pipe diameter ≤ 20%.
20% < undulation / diameter ≤ 35%.
35% < undulation / pipe diameter ≤ 50%.
Fluctuatin height / diameter > 50%.

Defect.Name: Disjointed
Defect.Define: 两根管道的端部未充分接合或接口脱离

DefectDescribe.Content: Lightly disjointed - a small amount of mud is squeezed into the end of the pipe.
Moderate disjointed - the disjoint distance is no more than 20mm.
Severe disjoint - the disjoint distance is 20mm~50mm.
More Severe disjoint - the disjoint distance is 50mm or more.

Defect.Name: Interface material shedding
Defect.Define: 橡胶圈、沥青、水泥等类似的接口材料进入管道

DefectDescribe.Content: The interface material is visible in the above part of the horizontal centerline of the pipe.
The interface material is visible in the lower part of the horizontal centerline of the pipe.

Defect.Name: Wrong branch pipe
Defect.Define: 支管未通过检查井直接侧向接入主管

DefectDescribe.Content: The length of the branch pipe into the main pipe is not more than 10% of the diameter of the main pipe.
The length of the branch pipe into the main pipe is between 10% and 20% of the diameter of the main pipe.
The length of the branch pipe into the main pipe is greater than 20% of the diameter of the main pipe.

Defect.Name: Foreign matter penetration
Defect.Define: 非管道系统附属设施的物体穿透管壁进入管内

DefectDescribe.Content: The foreign matter is in the pipeline and its cross-sectional area of the occupied water is not more than 10%.
The foreign matter is in the pipeline and its cross-sectional area of the occupied water is 10%~30%.
The foreign matter is in the pipeline and its cross-sectional area of the occupied water is more than 30%.
Seepage - water continues to drip from the defect. Flow along the pipe wall.
Dripping - Water continues to flow out of the defect and out of the pipe wall.
Running - Water rushes from the defect point, and the area of the water leakage surface is not more than 1/3 of the pipe section.
Gushing - Water floods or ejects from a defect point, and the area of the leaking water surface is larger than 1/3 of the section of the pipeline.

Defect.Name: Deposits Settled
Defect.Define: 杂质在管道底部沉淀淤积

DefectDescribe.Content: The thickness of the deposit is 20% to 30% of the diameter of the pipe.
The thickness of the deposit is 30% to 40% of the diameter of the pipe.
The thickness of the deposit is 40% to 50% of the diameter of the pipe.
The thickness of the deposit is greater than 50% of the pipe diameter.
The cross-section loss caused by hard scaling is not more than 15%; the cross-water loss caused by soft scaling is between 15% and 25%.
The cross-water section loss caused by hard scaling is between 15% and 25%; the soft water cross-section loss caused by soft scaling is between 25% and 50%.
The cross-water section loss caused by hard scaling is between 25% and 50%; the soft water cross-section loss caused by soft scaling is between 50% and 80%.
The cross-sectional loss caused by hard scaling is greater than 50%; the cross-water loss caused by soft scaling is greater than 80%.

Defect.Name: Obstruction
Defect.Define: 管道内影响过流的阻挡物

DefectDescribe.Content: The loss of water occupied section area is not more than 15%.
The loss of water occupied section area is between 15% and 25%.
The loss of water occupied section area is between 25% and 50%.
The loss of water occupied section area is 50%.

Defect.Name: Residual wall, Brick, Dam root
Defect.Define: 管道闭水试验时砌筑的临时砖墙封堵，试验后未拆除或拆除不彻底的遗留物

DefectDescribe.Content: The loss of water occupied section area is not more than 15%.
The loss of water occupied section area is between 15% and 25%.
The loss of water occupied section area is between 25% and 50%.
The loss of water occupied section area is 50%.

Defect.Name: Root
Defect.Define: 单根树根或是树根群自然生长进入管道

DefectDescribe.Content: The loss of water occupied section area is not more than 15%.
The loss of water occupied section area is between 15% and 25%.
The loss of water occupied section area is between 25% and 50%.
The loss of water occupied section area is 50%.

Defect.Name: Scum
Defect.Define: 管道内水面上的漂浮物（测记录表，不参与计算）

DefectDescribe.Content: Sporadic floating objects, floating objects occupy no more than 30% of the water surface area.
The loss of water occupied section area is between 15% and 25%.
The loss of water occupied section area is between 25% and 50%.
The loss of water occupied section area is 50%.
